ru.yandex.subtitles.analytics

Interface EventTracker

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    YandexMetricaEventTracker

    public interface EventTracker
    Implement interface to provide event reporting to any tracking system, like Yandex.Metrica, Google Analytics, Fabric, etc.
